channel.title: Developer Groups on Syracuse.io
channel.description: Recent content in Developer Groups on Syracuse.io

item.title: /dev/drinks
item.description: A happy hour series for developers in and around Syracuse.

item.title: Hack Upstate
item.description: We organize weekend hackathons twice a year (i.e. Fall & Spring) where developers, engineers and innovators from across Upstate New York come to Syracuse, NY, share ideas, form teams and build awesome projects.

item.title: OpenHack
item.description: A casual meetup based around developer side-projects. OpenHack meets the second tuesday of every month at Coworks.

item.title: Women in coding
item.description: Providing affordable coding classes for women in the community. Women in Coding host affordable monthly classes as well as casual events for people to network and connect.
